title: The Braces Easter Egg
shortDescription: Try importing braces from __future__ - Python has a humorous response!
detailedDescription: Python developers occasionally joke about adding curly braces like other languages. The `from __future__ import braces` easter egg is designed to instantly shut down any conversation about introducing curly braces to Python. It throws a SyntaxError with the message 'not a chance', reinforcing Python's commitment to indentation-based syntax.
examples: # Try this in your Python interpreter:
# This is Python's humorous way of saying:
# 'We will NEVER add braces to Python!'
